text:
DEONTAY WILDER is preparing to defend his WBC World heavyweight title against Tyson Fury on December 1.

But, he has already won outside of the ring, having the stunning Telli Swift cheering him on.

6 Deontay Wilder has a baby daughter with his fiancee Telli Swift

6 Telli Swift is famous for being on WAGS Atlanta

6 Telli Swift set up the Boxing WAGS Association to help children and families

Who is Telli Swift?

Telli Swift was born January 24, 1987 in Zambales, Philippines - meaning she is 31-years-old.

Her real name is Shuntel, only taking on 'Telli' once she was famous.

She is a household name in her own right in America, featuring on WAGS Atlanta, which airs on E!.

Like her current boyfriend, Deontay Wilder, Telli was previously married, having a son, Kerron, with her ex-husband.

She has since had a baby with the WBC world champion and her fiancee, with their daughter born on March 7, 2018.

Meanwhile, Telli has embraced being the heavyweight's partner, setting up the Boxing WAG Association - it helps raise funds for service providers and non-profit organisations to support children and families.

6 Telli Swift regularly posts pictures of her children to her 224k Instagram followers

6 Deontay Wilder and Telli Swift have been rumoured to be dating since 2015

6 Telli Swift was a model before becoming a reality TV star

Latest Boxing News BEST OF BRITISH Dubois vs Gorman: Live stream, TV channel, start time and full undercard PAC IT IN Khan wants to fight Pacquiao next in Saudi Arabia after battering Dib Live Blog SAUDI KING Khan easily beats Dib in four rounds after recording two knock downs in Jeddah KING BEATS KID Khan destroys Dib in four rounds to earn easiest £7million of career DU ONE Daniel Dubois snubs handshake but vows to pick Nathan Gorman up off the canvas PETER PANNED Fury wins shambolic fight as Peter retires and blames ref for shoulder injury FIRST DIBS Khan vs Dib live stream FREE: TV channel, ring-walk time and full undercard BOXING FAMILY What relation is Hughie Fury to Tyson Fury, and what is his boxing record?

When did Wilder divorce Jessica Scales-Wilder?

Wilder married Jessica Scales in 2009 and proceeded to have four children with her - two sons and two daughters.

Their eldest child, Naieya, has spina bifida, with the boxer often calling her an inspiration as she battles the disability.

The three others are called Ava, Deontay Jr and Dereon.

But Wilder had an affair with Telli Swift, and eventually divorced Jessica in 2017 after eight years of marriage.
title: Who is Deontay Wilder’s fiancee Telli Swift and when did the Bronze Bomber divorce ex-wife Jessica Scales-Wilder?
